entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 then light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
